title: Stein Variational Guided Model Predictive Path Integral Control: Proposal and Experiments with Fast Maneuvering Vehicles
author: Kohei Honda
Naoki Akai
Kosuke Suzuki
Mizuho Aoki
Hirotaka Hosogaya
Hiroyuki Okuda
Tatsuya Suzuki
desc: This paper proposes a novel approach to Model Predictive Path Integral Control using Stein Variational Gradient Descent and provides experimental results with fast maneuvering vehicles.

title: When to Replan? An Adaptive Replanning Strategy for Autonomous Navigation using Deep Reinforcement Learning
author: Kohei Honda
Ryo Yonetani
Mai Nishimura
Tadashi Kozuno
desc: This paper presents an adaptive replanning strategy for autonomous navigation based on Deep Reinforcement Learning and discusses the proposed approach's effectiveness.
